mapper.insert: insert into toy_user_boards (board_no, board_title, user_id, board_content) values (board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select board_no as no, board_title as title, board_content as content, board_view_count as viewCount, board_deleted as deleted, user_id as userId, board_created_date as createdDate, board_updated_date as updatedDate, board_deleted_date as deletedDate from toy_user_boards where board_no = #{value}
mapper.update: update toy_user_boards set board_title = #{title}, board_content = #{content}, board_view_count = #{viewCount}, board_deleted = #{deleted}, board_updated_date = #{updatedDate}, board_deleted_date = #{deletedDate} where board_no = #{no}
